case.state: You okay?
So I'm Pit... Say is... is that Lady Palutena?
Hey. I'm Pi... Dark Pit.
Name's Pit...too. Pittoo. That is, Dark Pit.
I'm Pi- Dark Pit. If that's all, let's start.
Sorry to keep you waiting! I'm Pit.
I'm Pit! Glad to be here.
Pit, Captain of Lady Palutena's guard. I'm here on her behalf.
Oh, you look very polite. I look forward to playing with you!
(Huh... she seems a bit familiar... but I can't think of anyone exactly like her...)
Please don't. I'm just a servant to a higher power, after all.
Two?!
Hey, she has a point! Keep that thing holstered!
Man, your church kinda sucks. Lady Palutena and I play video games and stuff pretty often, and that's just one example!
Wait, you can't cut out at the most important part! What am I supposed to call you now?
Woah, this guy seems even tougher than Magnus! Is he even human?
Th-This winged girl's in her underwear! Come on, we should find you some clothes! Er, wait...
...Is that a talking sheep?
Oh! It's Lucina! Why are you here?
(I should be wary with this guy... I've never seen that type of Arm before.)
Hello, little butterfly. Let's do our best together, shall we?
(Oh jeez, I didn't expect Samus to be here... gotta act casual...)
Hades? Oh, it's on!
(Hope this disguise holds up...)
(My Halloween costume's gotta fool them, right?)
Don't think I'll go down easy. I know exactly what I'm doing. (Except I don't.)
So you want to see me naked? I invite you to try...
What a bunch of chumps. This'll be a breeze! (Sorry, I don't really mean it...)
Guess you're who I'm playing against tonight? That's cool.
I can't say I'm looking forward to this... but I can't let Lady Palutena down!
Ah, I may be new, but don't think you need to go easy on me or anything. I'm a very capable fighter!
I, uh, look forward to... undressing you? Wait, that came out wrong. You know what I mean.
You don't seem that tough. I'll win this on behalf of the forces of Skyworld!
I'm more used to other kinds of games, but I can probably get the hang of cards pretty quick.
Lady Palutena, please bless this little guy!
I'll trade one for one. Seems fair, right?
Just need this last one...
This card was the weakest link. So, sayonara!
Lady Palutena, please bless these next ~cards~.
Um... can I trade for ~cards~?
Not feeling these ~cards~. I'd like something else, please.
Yeah, these ~cards~ can go.
Woo! Great start!
If I keep getting cards like these, winning'll be easy!
Guess beginner's luck does exist.
Alright! Look out, everyone!
Just try and top this!
Hey, this hand is pretty good! I think?
I haven't lost yet, and I'm not going to any time soon!
Yep, nothing to worry about. Not losing yet!
A good hand? Is this the start of a lucky streak?
I think these are good?
Man, this hand could have saved my armbands! Where were you back then huh?
Nice, a free pass to the next round!
Does anyone hear that noise? It's the sound of me, not losing!
You did good, dealer. You did good.
The last one was a fluke, by the way. I'm not losing again!
Heck yeah! I'm winning this hand!
Watch, I'll win this hand! And I won't even break a sweat!
You aren't taking my clothes again that easily.
Easy! I've already won this hand!
Might as well crown me the winner now.
Glad that we're on the same page, Dealer.
Yes! I love you, dealer!
Thank goodness. I almost had to show some skin.
Looks like I get a little break this turn.
Perfect! I'm keeping my tunic on for now, thank you very much.
You wouldn't believe how happy I am to see these cards.
These cards are very welcome right now!
Oh good, I get to keep my dignity for a bit longer.
Thank you. Just... thank you.
Sorry, to disappoint everyone, but I'm staying dressed a little longer.
Yes! Exactly what I was hoping for!
You didn't have to. Really. I could've won with a way worse hand.
Thanks for having my back this time. I may have needed it.
This should be enough to keep me in, but if it's not...
Right. No... problem.
You may have gotten me naked, but it takes more than that to degrade an angel.
Good enough, I hope.
I don't think many hands can beat mine, so...
Excellent. I'm not doing... that just yet!
So! Tell me a little about yourselves.
Hey, are any of you hungry? We could all just go get dinner instead. Last chance, while we're all still dressed!
Out of curiosity, is this something you all do often? You all seem to know what you're doing.
Less than optimal, still doable.
Not a terrible hand, but it really can be better.
This is certainly a hand.
I think this is pretty good? Should get me through this round, at least.
Hey, a hand that's useable!
Time to see what happens.
I'm not really the type to just watch things unfold, but let's see how this goes.
We're waiting on you, ~player~.
Alright! Who's luck gonna favor today?
This hand's a bit... shaky.
Shouldn't be too bad. Just need one of you to have a worse hand than me.
Uh, right. Let's try and make this work.
C'mon, little cards! You can do it! Win this for me!
I've had worse, believe me.
Don't let me down now!
This can go a lot of ways... hopefully, this will go in my favor.
I can handle it.
No matter what happens, I won't give up!
Got a lot riding on this.
This has to win, right?
Please pull through. I need this.
So, uh, what're the odds of me losing with this?
I reallllllllly hope this is enough.
This is getting way too intense. I don't think I'll be able to take much more.
I might have just enough to pull it off...
I've got a good chance of winning this round... I think.
Will this be fine? Please be fine.
This is way too risky.
I hope luck's on my side tonight...
Hurry up! I need to know if I'm still in or not.
This still might be able to snipe a win. Ooh, now I'm getting excited!
I'm not out yet! I can still win this!
I'm a soldier! I can't back down, even now!
I'm just gonna shut up and hope for the best.
We just started! How am I already getting garbage?
...I don't like this omen.
On second thought, maybe I should drop out. Y'know, make it easier for the rest of you.
Are you messing with me?
What's the big idea?
Is there some sort of beginner's handicap or something I can use?
Uh oh. Bad sign.
Well, uh, you can't see it right now, but I've totally got a flush. (That's a good hand, right?)
(Hope someone has worse, 'cause these cards aren't winning any awards.)
This will not end well.
This is unacceptable! I want a reshuffle!
Come on! My luck isn't this bad, is it?
Real cute, dealer. Picking favorites, I see.
If you haven't noticed, I'm not a dumpster! Trash does not belong on my doorstep, dealer!
This can only get worse. I can't watch.
Are you messing with me again, Lady Palutena?
Not again... it feels like I just lost my sash.
Alright, joke's over. I'd like some good cards now, please.
This isn't really what I have to work with, is it?
Funny. Real funny, dealer.
How do you expect me to win with these?
Should I start undressing now?
Am I really gonna have to strip?
No way... not like this...
This feels like bullying.
Seriously? It's like you want me naked.
This is a losing fight... I can't look.
Nononono!
Maybe I had the right idea about this place after all.
Uh... double or nothing?
Is it too late to quit?
Thanks dealer. Real reassuring.
Help.
Not good! Not good!
How about I just tap out? I won't even get dressed! N-No?
How did my life lead up to this moment?
(What's this feeling?)
I think the regret's setting in.
I knew from the start these games were rigged.
Wait, you never said I'd be competing against you, Lady Palutena!
(So, my opponents include these two schoolgirls and... a witch?)
(So, my opponents include a witch and a pink-haired schoolgirl... hmmm...)
(So, my opponents include these two schoolgirls and... a witch?)
E-Everyone's looking at me! Please, go away!
Natsuki, you're in a Literature Club, right? How do you... do it? Read, I mean. I don't know how...
Monika, you're in a literature club, right? This is a little embarrassing to ask, but... do you know anyone who'd be... interested in teaching a guy to read?
There's no one behind me, right? I don't want them seeing... wait, now all of you can see it!
(Maybe if I look away, I can focus better... wait, they can all see my butt now!)
Sorry if I'm being... distracting. Maybe turning away will help?
I can't focus if you keep staring at my crotch! ...You're still staring at me, aren't you?
So... the strongest mortal I've ever known... that's gotta be Magnus. No other human I've met could clash with Underworld and Skyworld forces and win!
(She's kind of scary like this... I hope she isn't planning anything...)
I'm losing pretty bad, aren't I? Yeah, I wouldn't mind having a rematch...
C-Can you even summon me? I'm an angel, not a spirit...
As much as I'd love a rematch, that wouldn't work. I wouldn't be able to read your signature...
Hmm... this is getting pretty down to the wire, Tora. How about we spice things up? Whoever loses first has to do one thing the winner wants.
I come from Skyworld! A wonderful floating utopia of floating islands and temples!
O-Oh... I didn't know people casually carry around those kinds of pics...
Lady Palutena is the guardian of humanity and goddess of light! She and I work together to protect both the earth and the heavens!
A neat trick, but, uh... I think you should return it to how it was.
Aww man, I wanna play too...
Oh, happy birthday! Odd pick, though...
Me... and Meia? She's attractive and all, but... I don't see how it'd work...
I don't think that's a good thing... I asked Lady Palutena for advice before we started, and she told me to avoid that type of stuff.
Huh, fair enough. I always wondered if I'd be more efficient with a bike, but then I remember I have big wings right on me...
You have... very weird tastes. I hope they don't provide those...
I-In my opinion, I think you look really nice! Not that I've been looking there a lot... eheheh...
(Natsuki's got a really cute butt...)
B-Being naked for your audience is probably a new feeling for you, huh? If you need a helping hand, I could... er... assist?
Oh, nice to meet you. Have you seen Chihiro around, by any chance?
Wait, time out! Let Muffins put that back on!
I-I'm a little curious... is being naked considered normal for a love fairy? Like, the opposite of what most of us think is normal?
Frankly, I'm just confused how you managed to gain clothes from that. Even if they're just bandages.
N-No, nothing at all! Just a bit... how do I put this? Embarrassed...
Hey! These are my actual wings! Don't zap me!
Revy, why would you even say that? It's not a race thing, it's just that... boobs are boobs! I shouldn't look!
Huh... would that work on me? I'm not sure how different I am from humans...
Well, nothing like that... but I did win twenty dollars at a holiday party once.
You know, it's funny you mention that. I get to places through doors Lady Palutena opens. They take me right to where I need to go, and that's here!
A boar? I didn't know they made good pets...
Wow, another goddess! It's an honor to meet you!
I have no idea who that is, but it's actually pretty cool knowing there's other angels like me out there!
I'm not much of an artsy kind of guy...
Sprouting limbs isn't the weirdest thing I've ever seen, so I'll be okay, I think.
Why Flower Flower? Wouldn't Limb Limb or something make more sense?
I'd give myself the ability to fly on my own... still kinda bitter about that.
Kyou and Ryou... I bet you two get mixed up a lot, right? Same thing as me and my own twin, Pittoo. At least, I'd imagine.
She knows that fortune telling stuff is mostly pseudoscience, right?
Pose? Like this...?
Well, this got awkward...
Heh, yeah. They're pretty rare to find, but oh so worth it! The way it goes down your throat, the texture and taste? Not to mention the instant rejuvenation it gives you.
Hey, excuse me? Your butt's kinda showing...
I am glad you're staying, Perona. You bring a really nice mix of good and bad to the table that I doubt many others could!
I'm made of pretty sturdy stuff. Although if you wanted to spar, I could indulge you...
Hoo boy, where do I even begin with this one... I got a ton to say...
Beef bowls? Those sound... really good, actually. I'd love to try one.
G-Guess we are... although looks like you have it a bit worse than I do at the moment...
I-I've shared hot springs with others before, but only fully clothed! I've never been... you know, naked with others before!
O-Okay... like this?
Hmm, I don't think I've ever been shopping with others before... normally I just do it all on my own.
Wait, you took a train here? I didn't know there was one...
The best food in the world is the Drink of the Gods... nothing else in the world compares to the burst of pure energy it gives.
I don't actually... have any friends, aside from Lady Palutena...
So, Jotaro... ever try using a weapon like the Orbitars? Arms? I feel like they're your style.
Hey, I like your hat and coat! Definitely gives off the tough guy aura.
Seems it all cleared out. That's a relief. But, uh, I still think we should probably wash our hands after this.
You know way too much about lobsters for someone whose job doesn't involve 'em...
A present? What kind of present?
What was that crazy light show...?
What was that crazy light show...?
What was that crazy light show...?
Maybe this is a bit unexpected, but... it was the heart of the lord of the Underworld. Totally different from the real guy.
U-Uh, ignoring what Zoe said, I really would appreciate if you tutored me...
Hold on, hold on! What's with these weird cube things? They look suspicious...
This level of devotion's almost a little creepy...
Say, that's not a gun, is it?
You can't fool me "Angie". I know you're just another Corrin.
(Athena looks...familiar. Have I seen her before?)
Captain Falcon's here? Oh man, how can I beat someone who plays this daily?
Well, Corrin's here. This'll be... interesting.
Well, Corrin's here. I'll enjoy beating him, at least.
Is that the Hana Song? I'm, uh, a fan of your streams.
Wait, this catgirl's naked already! W-Why is she playing with us?
(Hold on, I think Kurumu is a servant of the Underworld! Now I can't lose this!)
Oh man... why is he here?
Lyn? Like the Assist Trophy? I didn't expect to see you here.
That's... an angel costume, isn't it? How flattering...
Oh, you're here too, Peach? Didn't think you'd be into this type of game.
Rosalina? You're here too?
H-hey Samus... guess we'll be competing?
I think I know you... Shantae, right? You were a Spirit.
Wait, you're streaming this? That isn't what I signed up for!
I guess this'll be a little easier with you here, Ms. Fit... I trust you to not shame me...
Don't expect me to go easy on you just because I know you, Zelda.
Oh! I wasn't expecting to see a goddess in a place like this. Honored to meet you.
Annnd it's already getting crazy. Hey, Dealer, is it too late to drop?
Wait, you're an angel too? Where's your wings?
You're... the Cynthia, right? Go ahead, then! Ask me anything.
I-It's pretty embarrassing with you staring at it, Akko... you should look somewhere else. Like at this bow! I-It's cool, right?
(She sounds genuinely concerned...) I-It's okay, Natsuki, she wasn't that rough...
What? Why would I ever be in a group like that?
O-Of course they are! I'm not some kid playing dress-up!
Strong? Is that supposed to be sarcastic? No one ever calls me strong...
V-Very much so.
Well, Natsuki, I do have a black-winged evil side. But he's only as strong as me. And not actually me.
A-Anal? Why are you asking me? I've never done stuff like that in general!
Are you buying drinks? I'll just take a cream soda, please.
I can only sort of fly, Shimakaze. I need magic to help, and only for five minutes at a time.
AAAAAAAAH!
Wait, what's she doing? Something about a strawberry tart?
That is a shiny rod...
(This is way too similar to what happened with the Aurum... I should keep an eye on her.)
Sounds like you've never walked on a cloud. You should visit Skyworld sometime! I think you'd love it.
Oh. For a second I thought you meant a different Eggplant Wizard.
Wait, Pittoo? You know him?
That's the last thing I need to be worrying about right now...
I-I would prefer if you made it a good thing, yeah.
...Who the heck is this? Friend of yours, Ryuko?
What? I'm not a Pokémon myself!
It's an amazing feeling, going against so many famous heroes! Kinda like here, actually.
That's absurd! I would never compare myself to the power of the gods!
As real as can be, Megumin.
I mean, this is the only outfit I have. So... this?
It's a bit embarrassing, but I'm not a big movie guy. Skyworld doesn't have the budget for a cinema...
Nah, I'll pass. I already serve Lady Palutena.
Well... you definitely looked like a pro while you were doing it! Oh, and you were pretty cute, too.
Hmm... Tora rolls off the tongue pretty well. How's that?
Ooh, I like stories!
So, do you think they have one of those food shacks around? I'm starving!
S-Say, whose house is this? More importantly, can I use their fridge?
Bit of a plain stage here... you think they sell food?
Is it...? It is! A hot spring! Man, I'm feeling better about this game already.
So what kind of food do you have in this joint anyway? I'm starving!
Fancy place. M-Maybe we shouldn't ruin it by playing this silly game.
Wh-Whose bright idea was it to set this up in traffic? And somewhere where everyone can see us?
A-Anyone can see us naked... I'll never live this down if word spreads!
Any of you watch the Super Smash Bros. tournaments? I'm a bit of a regular there, you know.
So yeah, I'm Pit! I protect the goddess of light, Palutena and the humans she watches over!
Any reason you left that seat empty? Waiting for someone, maybe?
Well, I'm glad there's only four of us here. The less people that see this, the better.
Oh, there's an empty seat. Were we just the leftovers...?
So, uh... Mahiru...
No one's ever grabbed me...there before. Wow...
Alright, I had some time to think. Deal me back in.
I wasn't thinking straight... I shouldn't have done that, huh?
So, uh... what did you all think? About my sacred buns, I mean?
I'm almost always fully decked. I almost never take off those bands.
Even if it's just my armbands, taking off any of my clothes in front of others is... awkward to me.
Feels nice to flex my arms without the bands getting in the way for once.
My outfit better not fall apart. I need all the layers I can get.
Two layers down, but I'm still in the game!
Hear any good jokes lately? I got a bunch if you're interested.
So now that we've been here for a while, tell me: what's your favorite foods? I've got a bunch!
At least the floor's not hot. A cold floor I can handle fine, but hot? No way.
I'm not sure how much longer I can keep the rest of my clothes, honestly. But I'll do my best!
Last time I was this exposed in public wasn't by choice...
Yeah, I know I'm not the most in-shape guy out there. Hope you all don't mind.
I know I could remove my laurel crown, but it might get mushed if I do. So... I'll remove my bottoms next time I lose.
Soo... this is my body. Yeah.
You're all staring at it. It's so embarrassing...
Thank you for not laughing at me. I'll try to handle this with a little more confidence.
Theater Club? I don't think I've found that one yet...
Club? I'm not sure what you mean.
That'd be silly, Akko. (Everyone knows a club's a weapon!)
But Monika doesn't either... right?
I-I admit, it's pretty cool to see a human skilled in the ancient art of magic...
S-Sure? (I don't like this... whispering's almost always bad for me...)
(They're whispering... I don't like that.)
N-Natsuki? What's this... all of a sudden? I...
(Annnd they're whispering again...)
(I guess I am on a date with Akko? I'm okay with it, but... I just wish I remembered agreeing to it...)
S-Sure am, Akko! It's what I'm best at, after all!
Akko, please. It's a tunic.
(I feel like I'm sort of animal on display...)
(What are they both talking about? I can't keep up anymore...)
A d-date? Are we... going on a date, Natsuki?
But you're not dead.
I'm an angel, not a reaper.
You think so, Rinkah?
Allow me to explain, then! Lady Palutena is the goddess of light, and protector of humanity as a whole.
Lady Palutena's the kindest woman you'd ever meet! A paragon that stands up for humanity, no matter what!
Well... I help with any task necessary, whether at home or on the battlefield.
So I should just go along with it? ...Would you like that, Akko?
So I should just go along with it? ...Would you like that, Natsuki?
Of course I do! But I won't stand to let you insult her!
Why wouldn't I? If there's anyone you should listen to, it's Lady Palutena!
Lady Palutena's divine protection and guidance, of course.
Of course not, 9S! Look Meia, If you want to start something, I'll be happy to answer the call.
Er, what's a Bible?
Of course! I'd give my life for her!
No way! It's a wonderful job, and I'm lucky I get to see it first hand!
No one's called me "sir" before... I like the sound of it.
Of course. You're not being very persuasive, after all.
It's fine. I'll do what I have to.
What do you mean questionable? It's a legitimate source!
Wait, I don't have them applied, do I? That'd be bad...
No need to be rude about it...
Well, at least you can recognize a good inventory when you see it. You're not so bad, Polly.
Hey! I'm very good at my job, I'll have you know!
I can keep going! Just watch me!
Oh, you can understand it? Cool! But... can you tell it I can't really give up my job? Serving Lady Palutena is my life's passion, no matter what!
O-Oh no... I think Lady Palutena might have pulled a prank on me...
Oh man, Skyworld is full of the most beautiful temples you've ever seen! I'd totally be down to show you!
It's a bit embarrassing to admit, but... I've never actually been to a party.
Well, if you must know, I'm an angel! That means I serve the goddess of light. And these wings are functional with her power!
Oh, I've actually raised a few Pokemon in my day! PikaPit was my pride and joy.
What's wrong with white? It looks good on me.
It is true! To think I'd meet someone who's shared my troubles here...
You'd think, but not on my own I can't.
Hey, leave her out of this! She only wants what's best!
Gimme a break... I can barely read the cards.
Ah, um... I guess I am a guardian angel for most of humanity, so... probably?
Hey, it's Pit! Who's this Kyle guy?
It's not a gimmick... I'm a bona fide angel!
Yep! Always have been, although I'm... different from human interpretations of them.
Oh, me? I'm a monster slayer! I fight and beat up all the baddies of the Underworld Army!
Someone else? Finally! I've found my kin!
Why not? Something didn't happen to it, did it?
That drink really hit the spot, Akko! I'll have to pay you back for it sometime.
I have an aura?
Hate to have been the one to discover that.
But you're not dead.
I'm an angel, not a reaper.
Uh... sure? Although now isn't the best time for it...
Unless your mother is Lady Palutena, which would be a big plot twist... probably not.
Don't be. I'm the captain of Lady Palutena's private militia. If I can't do this, it'd be shameful!
As real as can be, Lotte! Hope I can make this a good game for you.
Uh, I am, Lotte! Although, looking at you, I'm not feeling quite like one at the moment...
Sorry this couldn't come sooner, Lotte... if it's any consolation, I liked your fanfic...
Of course I'm sure! Not that any cosplay would even work with these wings...
(Akko's looking at me pretty intensely... what's she thinking?)
You're not wrong... maybe I should speed this up.
You do? I didn't know there were any humans left who still studied angels...
I hope your info's accurate... I don't want to be slandered in front of everyone.
(She seems mad... did I upset her?)
It does, but I'm not the type to wiggle my toes...
Sorry, Akko. Not that exciting.
Really? Why's that, Akko?
Good question, Akko. Maybe they're gifts from the gods! Or... boxes have a really good magic energy, or something?
(Oh man... Akko's been waiting for this? Definitely feel the pressure...)
Is this really a victory?
G-Go on, Akko...
S-So I've noticed, Akko...
Yeah, all that's left are my shorts, Lotte... is that fine with you?
Oh, these angel wings are very real. Give 'em a pull yourself if you don't believe me.
That's probably as good a compliment I'll get from you, Amalia. I'll take it!
I guess I don't have a choice, Lotte... are you ready?
Come over there? Why?
Huh? You think I'm an idol?
I'm, uh, sorry to hear that?
Wh-What kind of question is that? Why would anyone offer me that?
I bet. People are picky like that.
F-Fetish?
...Uh, sort of? It's complicated.
They... love me?
Huh? Like, someone donated? For me?
...Lilim? What's that?
Ummm... I like drills. Does that count?
You could say that...
I love all sorts of food... burgers, pizza, especially ice cream!
Oh, sorry about that. I can fly, but only in certain conditions...
Hmm... well, frankly I've lived so long that I can't exactly remember my birth at all. But as far as I know, I've always been an angel with natural wings.
Archon? Is that your word for goddess? In that case, I serve Lady Palutena.
Hey, I can fly sometimes! It's not like I'm totally helpless...
I don't think I've met many girls with wings... so, uh... I think I'm attracted to girls regardless of if they have it.
Funny thing about that... yes, they are able to lift me, but only when blessed with Lady Palutena's magic.
Really? Green is a rare hair color back home. Only Lady Palutena herself has it!
Thank you! I really like your outfit, too. It's well put together and dashing!
To most humans, we're basically just myths. That's why we gotta stick together!
Well, I'd be harpy to show you after we're all wrapped up here! Hehe.
Hades... lord of the Underworld, and one of the strongest gods. It took me a long time to beat him... having four phases in a boss fight will do that.
Well, I have the blessings of Lady Palutena herself! Through that power, I've been able to slay even gods!
That's actually exactly right, Fina. How did you know about it?
You really think so? I never really thought of myself as cute before, but...
Oh, definitely! If I had to pick three things I usually do for fun, though... it'd be eat, play video games, and soak in the hot springs!
Hobbies, huh... oh! I do like to try new foods, or play video games, or use whatever hot springs I can find. Those are all pretty fun.
Oh, no, no, no! On the contrary, the fact I'm here just serves as testament to how peaceful things are in Lady Palutena's scope!
That's right! You're looking at the personal head of Skyworld's paramilitary operations! I serve in direct service to Lady Palutena herself!
D-Don't misinterpret things! I'm only here because I was asked to come...
Well, no, I'm neither of those things... maybe cute, but I'm definitely no girl or baby.
Yep, that's right! Although with one key difference... I have to clean up after every god.
You kidding? As far as I'm concerned, there's nothing wrong with it. Play away!
I don't know what an Illias is, but I'd rather not kiss a donkey.
Thanks? It's a tunic, though...
...Wing boy? I have a name!
I'm just here to complete Lady Palutena's mission. And I'm no siren. But my voice has been compared to a siren's before!
Wow, someone here actually knows what a Famicom is! Impressive, Futaba.
D-Don't patronize me! I'm a soldier, you know!
Familiar? I don't think we've met. I'd probably remember glasses like those.
An AI's like a computer, right? No, I'm a real, living angel, Kizuna.
I don't want any special treatment, L'Arachel. I'm just a player, like the rest of you.
Nope, not a bird. Have you ever seen a bird with wings like these?

Y-You shouldn't believe every rumor you hear.

I don't think our feet could compare. I run everywhere... but I wouldn't mind going over there, if you want, I guess?
You bet! I'll be sure not to disappoint!
Is that sarcastic, Angie? Although I do walk a lot...
Yeah! I'm sure you've had all sorts of fun adventures too, right? You should tell us sometime!
...You think I'm cute?
You think so? Well, hopefully I can show you a few more before the end of the night!
Thank you? I can't really verify that... no one's ever tested it's... "comfiness."
A photoshoot? I mean, I know I'm sexy, but am I really photoshoot material?
A photoshoot? I guess that's one way to get used to all this nudity. I'll, uh, consider it.
H-Hold up a minute, Ami! I've only just met you!
At least one of you is enjoying this.
Thanks, but now I'm kind of curious how you know that...
I'm not quite sure what you mean... I didn't bring any food with me...
I'm sure anyone would treasure it... you're very pretty.
"Dear"? "Cute"? D-Don't patronize me! I'm not a kid!
T-Thanks, Lotte. I try my best to keep in shape.
O-Of course they're realistic. They're real.
Guess we're both kinda weird, huh? I actually feel a bit better about this...
(Did I just get demoted to just a "benefit"?)
T-Thanks Sei... You're not a bad choice either. Although I wish you'd take it easier on the drinks...
Uh... okay! I don't have much, but I'll try my best not to lose again!
(I might just take you up on that, Akko...)
Y-You really think so? I'm not that great, but... I'd be happy to teach you...
D-Do you really mean th-that?
That doesn't sound healthy, Sei...
Pit? Imperil? You've lost me. Is that the drinks talking?
B-Brave? Noble? (It feels weird getting genuine compliments like this!)
I-I mean, you can touch it if you want...
I wish...
Do you... have something you wanna say to me? You're looking at me weird.
Oh, thanks! I do my best to stay fighting fit!
...Too sad? Sorry...
Well... I'm gonna try to keep you from seeing down there as best I can...
It really doesn't feel like I have any dignity left... I basically have everything on display now!
Well, I think that's how it might work. I've been trying to train my wings nearly every day! No luck so far, though...
Nope! All natural...
Th-Thank goodness... please, no more subscribers...
O-Obviously! I don't see people lining up to date me or anything...
I dunno. Mine is pretty great.
Yeah, I guess so! But... sensuous maidens? Really? I hardly know maidens!
I, uh... I-I'll try and go faster for you.
I'm not sure robots would like me as much as I like them, but I'm glad you think so.
Kind of a weird name... oh! Do you like to name your tools? That's kind of cute.
Even if he could talk, he doesn't like me. So... not happening.
I-I'm sorry... it's just with the two of you looking at it... and Sakura put a thought in my head... I-I'm just gonna shut up now.

condition.saying: I saw a cute angel boy

case.state: That's horrible... she should take care of her friends, right?
No... but the tone of my voice gets the point across.
Wish I could say for sure, but... for now, I guess you can study my... thing if you want.
Thank you. Maybe this isn't so bad, then!
Oh! Heh, I appreciate it. And hey! Sometimes I actually can fly!
I-I guess you're the other one, then? I could see it...
Wh-What kind of poses...?
I-It'd be embarrassing... and kinda hands on...
That may be true, but I didn't exactly see you help when Hades attacked!
Escort duty's not usually my thing, but I'll see if I can get you home safe, okay?
Oh, right... I come here in service to Lady Palutena, goddess of light.
Oh, that's easy. The water's natural healing properties have been drawn out by Skyworld magic!
Oh, the reason why is easy. It's because the water is blessed by Lady Palutena herself!
Hm? Something wrong? I wanted to hear what this Bunker had to say.
Obviously, Chun-Li. Why would I lie about something like that?
Why pretend? I'm saying from the start I'm not human.
If you want me to show more, just win more!
Really? Surprised you're not a Joker main.
I'd be happy to teach you! Orbitars are really fun to use.
That's not really the same thing. I'm not wearing anything on these wings.
Okay, okay. Just for that pun, I'll try harder next time, Joey!
...Well, that's a new record.
How did you get from my wings to my...never mind.
R-Really? That's very flattering, Kyu... both things.
Oh... yeah, I get that a lot from the other gods.
I'll be fine, but thanks for the offer.
Uh, Mae? Could you quit staring?
H-Hi...
Uh, don't worry about it, Ladybug. I got what you meant.
Yes! Right! S-Same to you, Ladybug!
What can I say? I have a lot on my mind.
Can you blame me? There's a very interesting cast we have here.
It's not in my nature to keep quiet, Meia. Hehe.
Y-Yeah, Misato? Well, I'll show you what I'm made of next hand!
I-I would prefer no biting at all, thank you very much.
You mean humans have found a way up to our domain? Impressive.

Like, bad angels? I guess I don't blame you...
Right! I'll do my best not to stare. Sure thing!
Aw, come on. I'm not that bad. You just gotta get to know me!
I'll pay you back for that loss, tenfold! ...Er, don't worry. I'll try and keep things nice.
Oh! I get it! I like your style, Zizou.
A fan, huh? I guess I don't blame you.
Thanks! You're pretty fascinating yourself!

Wait... did weapons count? Shoot, I could've brought my bow! Too late now...
Sure. But you've gotta tell me what you mean later!
N-No, I didn't come unarmed...I'm just... using a Palm, is all.
(I know I could take her in a fight... but let's not provoke her.)
...You know I don't have it on me now, right?
W-Where's this going, Kyu?
I'm quivering for a different reason.
Glad to have someone in my corner for once. Usually the world itself is against me.

Uh, okay... I'd like that back, though.

Oh... so she's like Lady Palutena. I see...
Lady Palutena? I guess she's like a manager...

Like, a favor? Maybe I could help...
I really hope you didn't jinx it.
I know a real goddess, thanks. But maybe a quick gaze will help...
Sort of. They're all useable as both ranged and melee weapons. And, uh, you're not so bad yourself!

Is that your mech? That'd be awesome! I'd offer to let you try mine, but it got sort of... destroyed.

Hey, these are comfy... try 'em if you don't believe me.

I'm really not like them... I swear...

Man, you really look like Magnus now.

In this game, we're competing to see who comes out on top, right?
What's happening to them?
I'm too skilled for ya!
I-I'm not looking! You can bet on that!
Ooh, dancing! How fun! I'd join you, but I kinda have two left feet...
Aww, what a cute little monkey. What's your name?
I-It wasn't? Sorry, I-I'll look away!
(Your top looked like it was ready to burst all night...)
Then again... I don't think I really want to see that.
Wait, the skirt so soon?
So soon? What happened to the headband?
Er, no! That's not what I meant! Um... please don't take it out of context!

Aww... but the comfiness!

We debuted around the same time, you know? So you were always, like... one of my idols.

S-Samus, I... apologize for taking it this far, but... I, uh...

You're just like Divinipedia!

Well, back home, humans are barely figuring out how to make mechanical devices. So people like you prove that the future's looking bright!
There's nothing wrong with starting small. I'd do it, too!
There's nothing wrong with starting small. I did it like that, right?
Well, hey! Look at it this way: you're doing better than me!
I-It's almost a shame we have to take it eventually...
Aren't you that girl who got pretty high on the Smash Ballot?
Ah! Hello there, little guy. What's your name?
People just don't appreciate pranks like they used to. I certainly don't mind being pranked.
Wait, are you serious right now? There's really nothing under there?
Obviously, I know it's a bit more complicated than that, but I'm not sure what else to call you.
I know it sounds crazy, but it's true, even if you don't know it...
You're pretty good at it, if I'm being honest.
Well, I didn't mind that much. It did hurt a bit, though...
All in the past. You had to do what you needed to win.
A good first choice! Hmm... you must be pretty smart!
What sort of world do you come from? I'd be interested in hearing that myself...
Man, I'd love to have the ability to just... take stuff off like that. It'd save me so much time!
Such a cool reveal... if I haven't said it yet, I do think you're super cool, Robin.

And you've got a pretty unique style! You definitely stand out among people here.

Can you maybe tone it back a bit? Please?

It's nice to properly talk to you! Do you know trainers by the names of Red and Leaf?
Not the hat! Maaaaaybe you should reconsider which one to take.

Well, if you aren't going to give me a straight answer, I'm going to do my darnedest to beat you! I'm already one win in!
Is there even a point to only wearing one stocking? It feels kinda unfair to your one thigh...
No hesitation at all! Even when it's all going off at once?!
Huh, you're a lot less intimidating like this. I guess the thing with imagining people naked during public speaking had a point.

Ugh... you're gonna make my head spin...
Please don't burn this place down.

W-Well, I'm here to protect milady Palutena! Buuuut she seems to have wandered off... so now I'm all alone. Great.
Speaking of, are you just... into anyone named Robin?
That was a long hang time. How high is this roof?
That was a long hang time. That thing's got some kick to it!
It's okay. You're fine now.

That's a really cool sword... and you look really cute wielding it...
...You know what? As someone who's been 8-bit himself, still hot.

state.text: T-This really seems like the type of place you should book a reservation for...

case.state: Do they even reach out here? I thought online interactions aren't rated by the ESRB.

That was awesome! I love it!

state.text:

case.state: Oh. (I guess not everyone can be blessed with a great physique like mine. I'll root for Erufuda!)

A-Again, I'm really sorry... at least you can see my bits, so it's kinda even?
At least you seem pretty normal. So... maybe it's not as bad I think!

case.state: I-I'm gonna play this out to the end. Don't worry about that!

No offense, but... have you even seen one before tonight? You seem to come from a very female-heavy world...
Um... I... sure, Akko.
(Maybe this won't be so bad. As far as teammates go, Akko's far from my worst one...)
(Okay... she's right. Let's show them my best!)
W-Well, if you're going to watch, Lotte, I'll try and live up to your expectations...
I kind of hope you mean an actual cave, but the way you're... spreading yourself... I-I don't really know how to answer.
U-Usually I am a bit... conservative. But if this is what it takes to please Lady Palutena, so be it.
I can do this on my own, Corrin. And it'd be weird to have another guy touch me. I'm not used to that...
If I do something wrong, please don't make fun of me, Ms. Song...
Angels don't lose their wings, though. At least... I hope not...
Alright, Kyu. I'll leave it to you to judge my technique, seeing how I don't really know what to do...
You know what's weirder than that? Actually doing it.
I'm just... gonna do this as far away from Moon as possible. I don't wanna catch Pokérus or something.
Lady Palutena never explicitly banned masturbation in Skyworld, Morrigan. And considering she was the one who brought me here...
I know you didn't mean anything hurtful by it. But could you at least not laugh at me or anything while I do this?
Forgive me for what you're about to see. This isn't meant for your eyes.
Of course I wasn't! I don't even know what a fraternity is!
I-I'm not corrupt! It's just this situation is... is... yeah.
I can maybe give it a try... I hardly know how to do it with my hands, so no harm in it.
...Alright, that was a good one. Let's start, I guess.
Y-Yes, S-ranks are the highest possible...
I've got a pretty good idea of what I should do. Mahiru gave me a bit of a head start...
No, it's fine... I can handle anything!
I don't want to hear any of your platitudes. I need to concentrate.
Sorry, I embarrass easy. I'll do my best to be entertaining.
Okay, Akko! But I'm warning you: I'm known for my speed!
I-Is that so wrong? I want the follow-up to your show to be strong!
C'mon... if you stare like that, I might die of embarrassment!
Hah... it's actually pretty relaxing...
Am I doing this right?
S-Stop staring, please...
Am I doing okay so far?
I've never done something like this before...
So... you guys do this for fun, huh?
P-Please, ignore me...
I-I know I'm handsome, but you don't have to watch!
Oh man... I am so getting scolded at home.
(Is Akko watching? She seems to be a bit of a showboat... so I hope I'm impressing her...)
I hope Gwen actually put in a helpful cheat... I have no idea what I'm doing...
Haru, it's kind of hard to focus with you... saying stuff like that.
How's it feel, ~player~? Not everyday you have two Nintendo studs masturbating for you...
(D-Don't watch, Natsuki... please...)
(Is she watching me? ...Do I want her to watch me?)
(I'm sorry, Natsuki... but you're really helping me right now...)
(I can't let myself look weak in front of her... keep it going, Pit!)
This is so humiliating... and in front of Lady Palutena, too...
P-Please don't watch me, Lady Palutena. I promise I'm not watching you!
I can do this... after all, Lady Palutena could.
Boner squad? Is this what it's like to fit in with humans? Feels nice... and almost offsets the awkwardness of this...
I'm ready to start my own Chain Attack...
Am I doing this right, Ms. Fit?
Can you give me some pointers, Ms. Fit?
Do you know a lot about how men do this, Ms. Fit? I might need a teacher...
I hope Lady Palutena won't mind... but then again she's a little dirty herself...
This is... a lot more embarrassing when I'm being judged by other angels...
I guess if other angels do this too, maybe this isn't so bad...!
I hope I'm good enough for you...
Angels... don't do this sort of thing...
I'm getting a weird feeling... am I close?
Why does this feel... so nice...?
I-I probably won't be too much longer...
It feels like... something's leaking out...
I'm feeling really good... is this because of Gwen's cheat code?
Ah... L-Lady Palutena... d-don't watch this, please!
I'M FINISHED!
If you want it, it's yours. I trust you to handle it well.
That'd be nice... although, any outfit'd be appreciated right now...
I wonder how many tries it took...
I'm sorry, Akko. Guys aren't built to do that.
You're okay, right? Don't drop on me now!
I-I dunno if it has any special powers or anything, so I can't say for sure...
F-Fine by me... It's a good joke, huh?
Yeah... who could've seen this coming? Not me. Hehehe...
I'm open to suggestions, Pinkie...
S-So... how'd I do for my first time?
Please don't... being judged is the last thing I want!
I-It's bad enough I did that here. There's no way I'd be brave enough to do this in Smash!
Sorry about the mess. I'll clean it up after the game.
What a feeling that was. Gonna need to cool down a bit... lower the intensity level...
So when do I get to put my clothes back on? I'm starting to get cold.
I hope that I can be friends with some of you when this is all over. I've grown pretty fond of you all... mostly.
I was expecting this to be way worse than it turned out being. Guess Lady Palutena had the right idea after all!
It feels nice to socialize with the average and not-so-average humans for once. I practically feel like one of you!
Say, y-you weren't really serious about before, were you Morrigan? It was just a trick, right?
(H-How should I deal with this Morrigan situation? She's a servant of evil, but somehow one of the nicest ones to me here. I'm stuck...)
Brrr... felt that cold breeze...
I guess this is one way to work on a tan...
Hope I don't get a sunburn from this... the base of the wings gets real bad.
Can we turn on the heater? I'm freezing over here!
It's kinda stuffy in here... where's the air conditioner?
Can you pick up the pace? As fun as that was, I still don't like being all exposed like this.
Guess I might as well watch the rest of you... the company isn't bad looking, you know?
Hey, uh... we get to redress after this, right? Feels kinda awkward just sittin' around with it all hanging out.
Wonder if I could have done better if I was able to read the numbers...
I'm, uh, feeling kinda exposed here... can you do your next hand real quick?
Just so you know, I'm not rooting for anyone in particular. May the best player win!
Y-You're looking my way... are you checking me out?
Kinda wish I had a towel or something... if only to clean myself up...
Obviously I'd win. (I'm so relieved. No one found out!)
T-That's! Uh... I-I suppose if you want me to come along, I can't say no. And the three of you are so nice!
T-That's! Uh... I-I suppose if you want me to come along, I can't say no. The three of you are so nice...
Wait, now? Y-You should get dressed first!
H-hold on! I'll help you out! Don't move a muscle, Florina!
Uh, y-yes! I'd be happy to play again, Akko!
You all got creamed!
Victory!
Nice try, but you're not ready yet!
Lady Palutena, victory is mine!
That was too close.
Erm, thanks everyone. Can I get dressed now?
~blank~
Congratulations, ~name~! But, uh, that being said, would someone want to... come take a bath with me? I need to get the dye out of these wings.
Have fun with your new friends, Saki! Maybe we can hang out sometime, too!
Hehe, that's actually a bit of a neat trick... I'm surprised at how you were saving that!
I gotta win back my honor. Let's go!
I'm glad if anyone won the side bet, it was you. I'll be here, waiting for orders.
Looks like you won the game and side bet, Angie.
Falcon won and I lost the side bet. Interesting... what'll it be, Cap? Please, nothing sexual...
I know you've been eying me, Clover. It makes me feel all awkward knowing that, but since I lost the side bet... I'll, uh, do whatever you want, okay?
I lost the side bet, didn't I... I'm worried what you have in mind, Corrin, but I'll honor it. I'll do whatever you want.
Corrin won... and I blew the side bet? Ouch. Alright, let's hear it. What do I have to do?
Okay. You won your little side bet. Now, what was that about "playing Halo"?
Oh, congrats Daisy. Even as an Echo Fighter, you still beat me, huh? Guess you should take a while to think about what I should do for you...
I dropped the ball, even with Gwen's cheats... But since you won the side bet, hopefully I can make it up to you in some way...
I may not have agreed at first, but you did win the side bet, so I'll honor it. Do what you want with me, ~player~, at least for a little bit...
So, Jura won both the game and side bet... I guess if there's anything you wanted to know about men, I'll do anything you want to see...
Oh, you won the bet, Kyu... so I guess you can do whatever with me...
How did Link beat me and make me lose the bet? Well, hopefully his lack of speech means I don't have to do anything.
I really lost to an Assist Trophy... okay, Lyn. If you ever wanted to humiliate a full Smash fighter, now's your chance...
Guess Mahiru won the game and bet... so what'll it be? More pictures of me? Let me know.
Did you have something in mind you wanted me to do, Marinette? You won the bet and all, so...
Oh, you won Mercy? I guess I have to do what you want. Anything you wanted to know about real angels, I can show you, I guess.
Morrigan won the game and side bet? Fine, I'll do what you want... but know there are some lines I will not cross!
Ah, right, there was that side bet earlier, right? Then I guess I'll do something you want, Natsuki. And it can be anything...
This doesn't really change anything... I didn't need a side bet to have done whatever you asked anyway, Lady Palutena.
G-Good job, Princess Peach. You took the game and side bet. Think of something for me to do, okay? I'm sure I can be more helpful than your average Toad, after all.
I think you won the game... and the side bet, so if you want to... spar, or something, I'll oblige you.
Well done, Rosalina. You won the game and crushed me in the side bet. So... for now, give me an order, I guess, and I'll do it for you.
Hey, you won D.va's side bet, Saki, so if you wanted to do something, I'm listening...
W-Well Samus, you won. Both things, actually. So I guess I'll do whatever you want? But please... take it easy on me...
Y'know, Valerie, there was that side bet earlier... and you did win it...
You're usually doing a lot for me, Ms. Fit, so maybe with this side bet thing I can give back to you for a change... just tell me what to do, okay?
Well done, Princess Zelda. I'm not sure what you'd want me to do, seeing as Link is usually your companion, but I'm here, ready to take an order if you want.
Wait, I lost that side bet, didn't I... gonna be weird having to serve a different goddess for a while...
Not bad, Nines. We should play again sometime.
How did the crazy gunwoman win?
Um... o-okay, Akko. Yeah! A summoning date! (I've never been on one before. This is exciting!)
Well done, Gwen. Let me know when you want those orbitar lessons. I'd be glad to teach you anytime.
So, you won. What'll you do now, Ms. Space Pirate?
Well this is embarrassing. I thought she was throwing the whole time.
This means nothing, Link. I want a rematch!
W-Well played, Lucina... can we agree to never tell Chrom about this?
Congrats on the win, Ladybug. You're really good at this!
I was going to invite the winner to the hot springs, but you? No way.
I lost to my impersonator? I don't know whether to be proud or upset.
I just have one word for you, ~player~: HOW?
P-Please don't tell anyone about this, Morrigan.
I had faith you'd pull through, Lady Palutena.
If I knew we were playing for a belt, I would've tried harder.
Good game, Rinkah. I'm still down for a hot springs trip, if you want.
Good job with that win, Saki. Do you still want to be friends?
Congrats on your win, Samus... so embarrassing...
Made us look like a buncha jokers.
W-well, looks like we achieved complete global masturbation... so good job, Sheva?
Well, it was good to see you, Ms. Fit. Can we maybe keep tonight a secret?
So, uh... those fries sound pretty good right about now.
A boyframiliar, Akko? ...Are you talking about me?
O-Oh! Do you want to go to a hot spring together, Lucina? I-I mean, if you don't mind...
Like a real party? That could be fun. You certainly seem friendly enough!
I-I don't like playing for such high stakes... but you're on!
H-hold on! I'll help you out! Don't move a muscle, Florina!

condition.saying: I think it's safe to say this was a pretty good team building exercise for us.

case.state: O-Oh, okay... you guys have fun... I'll be... over here.
Wait, come back! I need those! Darn it...
Sure, Ryuji. Why not?

state.text: Phew, it's over... hey, Samus, I, uh... was wondering if you wanted to hit up the hot springs? You know, to wash off?

case.state: That was kinda fun! Um... anyone want to use the hotsprings with me? ~name~?
Phew! Finally over. I'm gonna hop in the water now. Everyone's free to join if they want!
So now that we're done here, anyone down for a hot springs trip? ~name~?
Hades!
Hades!
Hades....
I always wondered how often people mistake you for a guy... but there's really no mistaking it today.
Oh no... ~player~, what have you done?
Ah! Sorry, I didn't mean to draw attention to it!
Um, Mika? Your mask...
I'll just forget I ever saw anything, okay? Rainbow Mika didn't reveal anything here! Nope!
Yeah, it was! We sing a pretty good duet, huh?
♪ Again today I will go soaring through the sky! ♪
♪ My enemies I'll dish 'em up in a stir-fry! ♪
♪ Gracious goddess of light watches from above!♪
♪ At dinnertime I always show the cooks some love!♪
Ooh, a victory song? Okay, follow my lead!
Somehow Jotaro's gonna walk away with some of the cleanest hands here...
Ooh, I want to see! Show us, show us!
Sure! I'd love to talk about stuff with you. We could trade heroic stories and stuff!

condition.saying: would you rather I joined you

case.state: I-I wouldn't be opposed to either of those, if you're offering...
I-I can't just go again! At least, not on my own..
I'm ready! D-Don't you worry!
Hmm... not working. A-And trust me, I tried!

condition.saying: use time magic here, huh, Pit

case.state: I'll be waiting, Akko!
Okay, Akko. You can count on me!
You look kind of exhausted. Take it easy now, okay?

condition.saying: I enjoyed the view up there

state.text: G-Glad to help... just give me a better warning next time, okay?
Th-That's probably because you're so... warm.

condition.saying: if you hate my guts after that

state.text: H-How could I hate you? It wasn't that bad, really...

case.state: Well, I wouldn't mind if you could get me some replacement clothes...
I-I've just been... admiring her muscles! A-Anyway! I think we should start focusing on the game!

condition.saying: warm her up with some light-hearted

case.state: Oh, good idea! Warming her up seems like just the remedy.

condition.saying: Corrin used to always give you trouble in Smash

case.state: Are you saying you don't know everything about fighting them?
Are you saying you don't know everything about fighting them?

condition.saying: I'm more accustomed to granting guidance

case.state: But that wouldn't be very... sportsman-like.
Not a bad choice. Clubs are really tough, you know? Even Magnus specializes in them!

condition.saying: Rinkah was a close ally of Corrin's

case.state: Gosh, how cruel... human lives can really end at any time, even for a princess...

condition.saying: Rinkah would understand us better than most

case.state: I dunno. Could you see me in a tactics game? It'd be crazy.
Right... let's show her team Skyworld means business!

condition.saying: This game's going rather well, don't you agree

case.state: I... think strategizing on how to beat Rinkah kind of helped get my mind off things.

condition.saying: what do you think of Rinkah

case.state: W-Well... I certainly respect her for her strength and pride.
Of course I have. That's Rinkah, princess of the Flame Tribe!
And you have a pretty amazing butt, at that... it looks so soft...
N-Nami, your butt... I can see it all! Should I turn around?
Wait, hold on a moment! This is slander against Skyworld! I won't stand for this!

scene.name: Scene 1
scene.directive: Oh. H-Hi.
I didn't think you'd actually show up.
And, uh, I see you're... dressed for the occasion.
So... should we go?

scene.name: Scene 2
scene.directive: I saw a pretty good-looking hot spring over there. Want to use that one?
Right, after you. You're the guest, after all.
Huh? Oh, I always go in fully clothed. "An angel must always be ready", and all that.

scene.name: Scene 3
scene.directive: Actually, I haven't seen anyone around here.
Lady Palutena recommended this one to me, but I've never actually come here.
Where is everyone...?

scene.name: Scene 4
scene.directive: Yoink!
H-Hey!

scene.name: Scene 5
scene.directive: So! What'd ya think of my sneaking skills? Not bad, huh?
V-Very funny, Phosphora... may I have those back now?
Hmm... nah. You are tresspassing on a Forces-of-Nature hot spring.
And with a human no less! Tell you what, how about we consider these the price of admission, hmm?
Y-You can't do that!

scene.name: Scene 6
scene.directive: Aw, don't be like that. This is a hot spring, you know.
D-Don't move it!
Aww, can the big, strong warrior who defeated Hades not handle a cute girl~?
...I-It's not like that...
Oh? Then let's make it even.

scene.name: Scene 7
scene.directive: Well? Not a bad trade, right?
Maybe you and your human friend could come with me? I'm sure it could liven things up...
S-Sorry, we gotta go!

scene.name: Scene 8
scene.directive: The two of you scamper off before you can speak. You both get inside an empty spring.

scene.name: Scene 9
scene.directive: So, uh... yeah. Sorry about what happened earlier.
Have you... been doing much since the card game?

scene.name: Scene 10
scene.directive: Sorry. It's just- I was totally helpless when Phosphora did...that.
If you couldn't tell, I... don't know how to deal with women very well.
I didn't even ask what you wanted... some host I am, huh?

scene.name: Scene 11
scene.directive: And I couldn't even win the game for Lady Palutena. It's shameful...
What'll she say if I return without even my bottoms now?
...What?

scene.name: Scene 12
scene.directive: You're saying you can help me learn to talk to women?
You'd be a great teacher! The other players at our game really like you, and you're super charismatic!
Seriously, thank you so much!

scene.name: Scene 14
scene.directive: Sorry. I don't think even you could help me get used to situations like this.
But experience is the best teacher, right?
S-So... how about you take the lead?
